Description.Text: Location The hotel is located 800 m along the Rua das Pedras, where guests can take the shuttle bus which stops only 500 m away. The beaches are also just 500 m from the hotel. Facilities The hotel was renovated in 2011. The hotel features 32 accommodation units. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic facilities, such as a restaurant, a breakfast room, a café and a bar, offer food and drink. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A TV room is also among the amenities at the hotel. Additional services include a transfer service and room service. Rooms Most of the accommodation units offer a sea view. Each accommodation unit features a queen-size bed or a king-size bed. Cots are available for children. A safe and a minibar also feature. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers a selection of sport and leisure opportunities. The hotel features an outdoor pool. The terrace is the perfect place to while away the time. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Leisure options at the hotel also include a gym and a sauna. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and B & B. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.
